iti14:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti14:2.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single shroud, shrouded by which people wander and transmigrate for a long time like the shroud of ignorance.
iti14:2.2: Shrouded by ignorance, people wander and transmigrate for a long time.”
iti14:4.1: Those who have given up delusion,
iti14:4.4: the root is not found in them.”
iti14:5.1: This too is a matter that was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
